alert.note: Alert for Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 2:04PM PST until December 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 4000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.
